name: The Missing Few
description:
GO BACK HOME.

Story Brief.
11 years after the disappearance of his son, Jack Norwood is brought back to the rural town of Staten. A call from an old friend Scott Clarke lead detective on your son's case brings you back home. As Jack follows the trail to unearth the truth, he might find out things have never been what they appeared in Staten.

Exploration.
In The Missing Few play as Jack Norwood, a father seeking to finally learn what happened to his son 11 years ago. Search the enigmatic rural town of Staten to learn the truth and find out who or what is behind the mystery. Explore the small town of Staten, a semi-open world. Discover clues that will eventually lead to figuring out who or what is behind the mysterious disappearances that plague the town; and your past.

Interactive Investigation.
Learn what's happened to the town of Staten by examining various locations and homes spread across a semi-open world. Obtain items and solve puzzles that will help open up new areas. Examine the personal possessions, notes, and letters left behind.

Key features:



  • AUDIO: This game features the Wwise audio engine with fully dynamic adaptive music, and ambiance. Wwise is the most advanced, feature-rich interactive audio solution for games.

  • STEALTH: A realistic stealth system, built into a dynamic environment. Use bushes and tall grass to hide and see enemies through walls. You can distract foes by throwing objects to get their attention, but beware - they can hear you.

  • INVESTIGATE: Collect items and clues to solve puzzles. Audiotapes with music and audio logs can also be collected and played in various locations of the world.
